componentPropertyDescriptors.propertyInfo: The name of the variable to be removed from the flow context.
The name of the variable to be set in the flow context.
The mime type of the value this context variable will be bound to.
The value to assign to the context variable being set. It might be a static or dynamic value.
Sets the mime type of the joined content in the message.
The delimiter char (or string) to be used to join the content of the messages.
Sets the mime type of the joined content in the message.
The logger level used to log the given message. Log levels can be configured from the {RUNTIME_HOME}/config/logback.xml file.
Sets the message to be logged. It can be a static or dynamic value.
Sets the new mime type of the payload content.
The path and name of the file to be read from the project's resources folder.
If true, the mime type of the payload is determined from the extension of the resource read.
The mime type of the resource read from local project's resources directory.

The path and name of the file to be read from the project's resources folder. The value which might be static or a dynamic expression must point to a file existing in the project's resources directory, e.g: /assets/my_text.txt
If true, the mime type of the payload is determined from the extension of the resource read.
The mime type of the resource read from local project's resources directory.
The path and name of the file to be read from the project's resources folder.
If true, the mime type of the payload is determined from the extension of the resource read.
The mime type of the resource read from local project's resources directory.

Sets the mime type of the script result in the message payload. E.g: if the result of the script is JSON, then application/json should be selected.This is useful to let the following components know how to process the message payload set by this script. The rest listener for instance uses this information to set the correct content type in the request's response body.
Sets the script to be executed by this component.
